meanings.definition: A printing process using a rotary press with intaglio cylinders.
meanings.sent1: The factory specialized in producing rotogravures for magazines.
meanings.sent2: I enjoyed looking at the colorful rotogravures in the art book.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over a stack of rotogravures, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like faded rotogravures, capturing moments in time.
meanings.sent5: The museum displayed ancient rotogravures, showcasing historical events.

meanings.definition: A section of a newspaper featuring photographs printed using the rotogravure process.
meanings.sent1: Every Sunday, I eagerly flip to the rotogravures in the newspaper.
meanings.sent2: The rotogravures in the magazine added a touch of elegance to the publication.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a clue hidden in the rotogravures of the newspaper.
meanings.sent4: Her smile in the rotogravures lit up the entire page.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully selected the rotogravures to accompany the article.
